senses.sense_definition: Relating to the Seleucid dynasty or the Seleucid Empire, a major Hellenistic state in Western Asia.

examples.text: The <w>Seleucian</w> kings ruled over a vast territory that extended from the Mediterranean to India.
Historians often study the <w>Seleucian</w> era to understand the spread of Greek culture.

senses.sense_definition: A person born in or living in the ancient city of Seleucia.

examples.text: As a wealthy <w>Seleucian</w>, the merchant had access to trade routes along the Tigris river.
The <w>Seleucians</w> gathered in the city square to hear the proclamation.
